definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Union was a tool used by the capitalists in their vain attempt to damp down the labour movement.
sentences.chinese: 那個黃色工會是資本家妄圖用來撲滅工人運動的工具。

sentences.english: The colonialists tried in vain to crack down on( upon) that country's economy.
sentences.chinese: 殖民主義者妄圖扼殺那個國家的經濟。

sentences.english: It’s my own fault, I want to grasp the intangible.
sentences.chinese: 這要怪我自己，竟然妄圖抓住無形的事物。

sentences.english: The police officer retaliated by shooting the soldier in the arm as he attempted to run from the scene.
sentences.chinese: 當士兵妄圖逃離現場時，該警員作爲報復擊中其手臂。

sentences.english: China condemned the movie as an attempt to "whitewash Japanese wartime aggression.
sentences.chinese: 中國譴責這部電影妄圖“美化日本戰爭侵略”。

sentences.english: And they are determined to expand the scale and scope of their murder.
sentences.chinese: 他們怙惡不悛，妄圖擴大殺戮的規模和範圍。

sentences.english: They didn't admit they were defeated; they began to recruit and attempted to stage a comeback.
sentences.chinese: 他們不承認失敗，他們開始招兵妄圖東山再起。

sentences.english: The Fed seems to have been spooked, and wanted to stop the markets' fall (see article).
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲似乎像是驚弓之鳥，妄圖阻止股市的下跌。

sentences.english: They tried to starve me out by a sex-trap.
sentences.chinese: 他們妄圖以女色迫我就範。

sentences.english: Finally, Satan was given freedom to try to scare Jesus into sinning.
sentences.chinese: 最後，撒旦任由己意妄圖恐嚇耶穌以使他犯罪。

sentences.english: This lightning especially as the devil's claw, trying to catch everything.
sentences.chinese: 這閃電尤如魔鬼的爪子，妄圖抓到所有的東西。

sentences.english: That scab union was a tool used by the capitalists in their vain attempt to damp down the labour movement.
sentences.chinese: 那個黃色工會是資本家妄圖用來撲滅工人運動的工具。
